item.title: #16: April 17, 2010
item.description:
#16: April 17, 2010

*Fanatics - I made a boo-boo with the file name. It reads #17 April 17, 2010, when it should read #16 April 17, 2010. Just ignore me for now. I plan on re-recording the show and putting a new file up - something about this one sounds a little compressed to me so I want to fix that. I'm on tour right now so bear with me until I get the chance to fix all this. Oh, and welcome to the new site.*

*UPDATE May 02, 2010 - fixed the file and re-recorded the show so it should sound better now. 'Should' being the operative word here. I'll check it out later.

01. Jimi Hendrix - Changes
02. Ike Yard - We Are One

item.title: #17: April 24, 2010
item.description:
FANATICS!! Welcome back. Do excuse the long delay in getting this new site up and running. I'm on tour in Germany/Switzerland for the past few weeks so I've been jumping online whenever I could to put in all the info from the previous site - on kerbs outside cafes, on the bus when a signal permitted, and in hotels if they didn't ask for a kidney. With 6 years of weekly posts, and just as many comments, you can imagine how long that took for each individual show to be copied. But we're Fanatics!!!! And we're worth it!!!

If anything isn't working like it should let me know. I'm pretty sure I put everything up here correctly but if ever there was room for human error it was about 457 posts ago. So, until next week - STAY FANATIC!!!

*Many many thanks to RikRokSMC for all things binary. Without him this would all just say 'R-TYPE: Loading Error'*
